name: Catan
description: Catan is a strategy board game where players compete to colonize an island, trade resources, and build settlements and cities.

name: Carcassonne
description: Carcassonne is a tile-placement board game where players build a medieval landscape with cities, roads, fields, and monasteries.

name: Ticket to Ride
description: Ticket to Ride is a railway-themed board game where players collect train cards to claim railway routes connecting cities across the map.

name: Pandemic
description: Pandemic is a cooperative board game where players work together to prevent global outbreaks of diseases and find cures before it's too late.

name: Dominion
description: Dominion is a deck-building card game where players use a random set of kingdom cards to construct their decks and gain victory points.

name: Splendor
description: Splendor is a game of chip-collecting and card development. Players use gem tokens to buy development cards and attract the attention of nobles.

name: 7 Wonders
description: 7 Wonders is a card drafting game where players build civilizations by drafting cards that represent various structures, wonders, and military developments.

name: Codenames
description: Codenames is a word-based party game where players give and guess clues to uncover the identities of their team's agents while avoiding the opposing team's agents.

name: Dixit
description: Dixit is a party game where players use imaginative and abstract illustrations to communicate and guess each other's cards.

name: Monopoly
description: Monopoly is a classic board game where players buy, sell, and trade properties, aiming to bankrupt their opponents by monopolizing the board.
